name: Zoleo Cradle Kit
description: Keep your Zoleo Satellite Communicator close at hand.Rugged cradle helps protect the sides of your Communicator.Cradle has button cut-outs.Includes: belt clip – for up to 2.5cm belts, strap insert – to thread onto straps up to 2.5cm and a standard camera tripod mount (¼"-20 UNC threads).
